about_the_game:
3rd of 4 brand new item packs adding weapons and armor that may or may not be totally OP to your game.

Spirit Pines and Stuff of Nightmares now have new Halloween items! There are also more than a few new quests!

A new Old God slumbers in the Ulthar Shrine.
A strange new creature roams the Black Woods.
Max and Davey both want you to do stuff. COOL STUFF. COOL HALLOWEEN STUFF.

Want some new weapons and armor? Maybe need a few extra INT points? Then come on in!
detailed_description:

Max and Davey both want you to do stuff. COOL STUFF. COOL HALLOWEEN STUFF.

Want some new weapons and armor? Maybe need a few extra INT points? Then come on in!

fullgame.name: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86 or compatible processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
